set.name: DMART-05 Fabulous Art: Fun Five Dragon ♡ Summer

property.name: Race
property.value: Master Dragon/Metallica

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Dragon Double Breaker (This creature breaks 2 shields. Before each break, shieldify the top card of your deck or put it on top of one of your shields face up.) ■ When you put this creature, choose one of your opponent's cards in the battle zone and put it on top of one of its owner's shields face up. ■ Whenever one of your creatures would leave, you may put a face up card from a player's shield zone into its owner's graveyard instead.

property.value: Blue Command Dragon/Green Command Dragon/Hunter

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ At the end of your opponent's turn, if your opponent put a creature or cast a spell without tapping a card in their mana zone that turn, and you don't have a 'Gaiash Kaiser, the Meteor', you may summon this creature for no cost. {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature, draw 2 cards. ■ Your creatures that cost 10 or more cost 4 less to summon. They can't cost 0 or less. ■ Your opponent's creatures can't attack you on the turn they are put.
